title: Ryu Hyun-jin Helps Dodgers Win 3rd Game Against Washington Nationals in National League Division Series
text:
Ryu Hyun-jin of the Los Angeles Dodgers helped his team win against the Washington Nationals in their third game at the National League Division Series at Nationals Park in Washington D.C. on Sunday.

Ryu gave up two earned runs in the first five innings before being substituted. The Dodgers beat the Nationals 10-4, to lead 2-1 in the best-of-five series, meaning they will reach the National League Championship Series if they can beat the Nationals once again on Monday.

For Ryu, who came on to the mound eight days after his last regular season win against the San Francisco Giants last month, Sunday’s game marked his third post season career victory after beating the St. Louis Cardinals in 2013 and Atlanta Braves last year.

He also lowered his overall post season earned run average from 4.11 to 4.05.
description: Ryu Hyun-jin Helps Dodgers Win 3rd Game Against Washington Nationals in National League Division Series
